targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 AS "mean_usage_idle" FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND time > now() - 30m AND "cpu"='cpu-total'  GROUP BY time(10s) FILL(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "mean_used_percent" FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(10s) FILL(null)
SELECT mean("usage_idle") AS "mean_usage_idle"  FROM "cpu" WHERE time > now() - 30m AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/) GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") AS "mean_usage_iowait" FROM "cpu" WHERE time > now() - 30m AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/) GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") AS "mean_usage_user" FROM "cpu" WHERE time > now() - 30m AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/) GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_system") AS "mean_usage_system" FROM "cpu" WHERE time > now() - 30m AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/) GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"
